headline: Zimmer Biomet (ZBH) Acquires Monogram Technologies to Expand AI-Driven Orthopedic Robotics Portfolio
summary: Zimmer Biomet Holdings Inc. (NYSE:ZBH) ranks among the best medical device stocks to invest in. Zimmer Biomet Holdings Inc. (NYSE:ZBH) announced on October 7 that it successfully acquired Monogram Technologies Inc., an AI-driven orthopedic robotics firm, for an upfront payment of about $177 million. This expands Zimmer Biomet’s orthopedic solution range by integrating Monogram’s semi-autonomous […]
